arts.ttl: Joshua Kimmich reflects on ‘the most intense first half of my career’ against PSG
arts.sum: Bayern Munich's Joshua Kimmich found the first half of yesterday evening's Champions League triumph against defending UCL Champions PSG to be one of the most unique experiences of his entire professional career.

arts.ttl: Vincent Kompany shares Luis Diaz's response after brutal Hakimi tackle
arts.sum: Vincent Kompany has sent his best wishes to PSG’s Achraf Hakimi after a tough challenge from Luis Díaz led to the defender being taken off in Tuesday night's game at Park des Princes.

arts.ttl: Luis Diaz is the hero and villain as 10-men Bayern Munich hold on to defeat PSG
arts.sum: Arsenal swept aside Slavia Prague as Atletico Madrid and Monaco also triumphed in the Champions League

arts.ttl: UCL PLAYER RATINGS | PSG 1-2 Bayern Munich – Bayern stake their claim as the best team in Europe
arts.sum: A clash of the two best teams in Europe at the moment, Bayern Munich are on a 15-game unbeaten run (with a 100% record), while PSG are the reigning Champions…

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Official lineups: Dembélé starts, not Neves
arts.sum: This Tuesday at the Parc des Princes, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Bayern Munich (2nd) in Matchday 4 of the 2025-2026 Champions League (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET). Here are the official lineups for this match: As always, we’ll wait until kick-off to be sure of the tactical plans. PSG (4-3-3) – Kvaratskhelia – Dembélé […]

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Live coverage of the Parisians’ pre-match
arts.sum: This Tuesday, as part of Matchday 4 of the 2025-2026 Champions League, first-place Paris Saint-Germain will face second-place Bayern Munich at the Parc des Princes. While kickoff is at 9 p.m. CET, the club is offering a live pre-match coverage of the players’ warm-ups starting at 7:45 p.m. Watch the live stream here:

arts.ttl: How to Watch PSG vs. Bayern Munich on TV, Live Stream
arts.sum: A thrilling encounter is expected in the French capital on Tuesday night.

arts.ttl: Champions League LIVE: Slavia Prague vs Arsenal, Liverpool vs Real Madrid & Tottenham vs Copenhagen - scores
arts.sum: Follow build-up to nine Champions League matches, including Liverpool v Real Madrid, PSG v Munich, Tottenham v Copenhagen, Slavia Prague v Arsenal with live text updates, radio commentary and reaction.

arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Vitinha clearly states the objective
arts.sum: Vitinha, the 25-year-old midfielder of Paris Saint-Germain (1st), spoke at a press conference this Monday ahead of the clash with Bayern Munich (2nd) at the Parc des Princes on Tuesday (kick-off at 9 p.m., live on Canal+) for Matchday 4 of the 2025–2026 UEFA Champions League. arts.ttl: PSG vs Bayern Munich – Luis Enrique gives the keys to the clash
arts.sum: Luis Enrique, head coach of Paris Saint-Germain (1st), spoke at a press conference this Monday ahead of his team’s clash with Bayern Munich (2nd) at the Parc des Princes on Tuesday (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET) for Matchday 4 of the 2025–2026 UEFA Champions League.
